channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- ASP.NET Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- ASP.NET Core

item.title: CVE-2019-0564|2024-08-04T17:51:27.161Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka "ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability." This affects ASP.NET Core 2.1. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0548.

item.title: CVE-2020-0603|2024-08-04T06:11:04.603Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in ASP.NET Core software when the software fails to handle objects in memory.An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user, aka 'ASP.NET Core Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0982|2024-08-04T18:06:31.304Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka 'ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0602|2024-08-04T06:11:04.661Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka 'ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0548|2024-08-04T17:51:27.229Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka "ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability." This affects ASP.NET Core 2.2, ASP.NET Core 2.1. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0564.

item.title: CVE-2019-0815|2024-08-04T17:58:59.256Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka 'ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1302|2024-08-04T18:13:30.222Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when a ASP.NET Core web application, created using vulnerable project templates, fails to properly sanitize web requests, aka 'ASP.NET Core Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1075|2024-08-04T18:06:31.539Z -- microsoft -- asp.net%20core
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in ASP.NET Core that could lead to an open redirect, aka 'ASP.NET Core Spoofing Vulnerability'.
